detail_desc: Large metal earrings in the shape of a face with plastic beads and sparkly stones in different colours.
Wide top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with an opening at the top with ties at the front and long sleeves with a gathered seam and wide, buttoned cuffs.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with mesh and lace sections. High waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length cargo shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, and flap leg and back pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with print motifs. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightweight, 3/4-length sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Mules with crossover fabric straps and rubber soles.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in cotton jersey doubled with a layer of mesh on the front. Ribbing around the neckline and armholes, a print motif on the front, and an appliqué at the front of the hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Loafers in imitation leather with fringes at the front. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Chunky soles. Heel 4 cm.
Wide trousers in a crinkled weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fully lined, high-waisted bikini bottoms with a shaping effect to hold in and shape the waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in velour with a low waist and half-string back.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, long sleeves with rows of fringing and elasticated ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a high, fleece-lined collar, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print on the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short skirt in crushed velvet made from recycled polyester with a concealed zip at the back, a draped section at the front and a short slit at the hem. Lining in a Tencel™ lyocell blend.

A kit to help you care for your trainers and keep them fresh. Contains Shoe Shame cleaning gel and a double-sided brush. 150 ml. Instructions: Apply the gel and moisten the brush. Brush the surface gently and then wipe off (test on a small patch beforehand). Repeat if necessary. Air-dry.
Longer shirt in lightweight, checked viscose flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a double layer at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.

Popover jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and double-layered hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip at the top with a chin guard, a kangaroo pocket and a front pocket with a concealed zip. Elasticated cuffs and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining made from recycled polyester.
Boxy jumper in a soft fine knit made partly from recycled polyester. Ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fleece gloves with ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in an airy cotton weave. Top with buttons at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Puff pants with elastication and a frill-trim at the waist and around the hems.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic slub cotton jersey with buttons down the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Poncho top with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with appliqués around the edge of the hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Four pairs of knee highs. 20 denier.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Soft, non-wired bra top in microfibre with folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimum visibility under the clothes. Wide shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support and a double-layered hem. No fasteners.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Super skinny fit – a close-fitting, slightly shorter style with narrow sleeves and darts at the back creating a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Leggings in jersey with a washed look. Elasticated waist and pin-tucks on the legs.
Jacket in a cotton knit with a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft, denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with stripes down the sides.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in lace with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one patterned.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Skirt in patterned chiffon with wide smocking at the waist and two flounced tiers. Lined.
Patterned tights with an elasticated waist.
Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar and welt side pockets. Detachable belt with D-rings and a tab with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.
V-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with decorative buttons at the neckline, buttons at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band that has a bow at the back. Width of brim. 5.5 cm.

Padded laptop case in grained imitation leather with a flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and metal ring with a decorative strap. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 2x27x36 cm. Fits laptops up to 13”.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Four pairs of earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2.3 cm to 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in patterned jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps that cross at the back. Double layer at the top with a braided trim. Longer at the back.

Short, V-neck dress in an airy cotton weave with embroidery and hole-patterned lace at the top. Wide flounce around the armholes, a narrow, elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Lightly padded all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Polyester padding.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and tapered legs.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Octagonal sunglasses with metal frames, adjustable nose pads and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Long jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Short, fitted vest top in a rib knit with a square neckline front and back.

Windbreaker in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Detachable hood, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with decorative zips at the top. Regular waist and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
